content.description: Same Crack as right hand from Illusions.  I Start with nice toe hook and right hand on round under cling hold left on first crimp in crack.

climbs.name: Natural Highs Come a Whole Lot Cheaper

content.description:
I've been looking at this one for awhile now. Before I broke my wrist, actually. It was a great way to get back into the game. It's the face with the death landing. A low crux leads to a thin, really sketchy slab. The slab includes a mono, a few holds that broke multiple times while cleaning and working, and some really skimpy feet. Needs more traffic, but I'm not sure that will work out. It cleaned up to be one of my favorite problems in the Dodge. As classic as most climbs of the same grade and danger in Bishop in my opinion. 

youtube.com/watch?v=I_5hi7iâ€¦
content.protection: I left my pad at home on accident. But I'd bring all the pads you can, a wheel chair, and some vicodin.
content.location: Boulder of Clarity...the face with the death landing to the right of Freaney's Fright

content.description: The first roof I've found at the Dodge. This thing is sssssiiiiccckkkk. Lots of tension, ok holds and poor feet.  Do some crunches before you get on this thing. Start on lip side jug move into seam behind you, slaps on both sides out to pointy arete, to the top.
content.location: from parking go diagnol right to cliffband and you can't miss it. It's prolly the only climbable roof you've seen in the Dodge.

content.description: Cruxy start, then up the arete.
content.protection: Three pads maybe more....unless you're Midwest Hardcore :)
content.location: Boulder of Clarity, on the way to Illusions of Paradise. Route starts on right hand jug and left hand on the arete. The face of this boulder looks heinous with a terrible landing. The landing for this route is good!

content.description: Move up the ever-thinner fin using good holds on either arete to tall topout.
content.protection: Pad, spotter would have been nice.
content.location: Looking at Freaney's Fright, turn 90 degrees left.  Thin fin of rock with halfway decent landing.  Getting down is a trick...

content.description: Short bulge just to the right of the crack project.  Start low in the break with underclings, up and left to pockets.  Big move to slopey rail and top out.     Top might need some more cleaning.
content.location: In the Illusions area, next to the crack project.

content.description: A roof along the cliffline with a couple lines, including the namesake Illusions of Paradise.
